channel.title: Could use a dev partner
channel.description:
I'm currently working on a 718, taking it slow and making sure things are done correctly, due to taking things slow it's hard to get things done on my own, most night's i end up staying up till 6 am to finish something and then i go to sleep and go to work at 1 pm so it's really getting in the way working alone. You don't have to be a master programmer, just someone who can program without needing a tutorial for everything, id like to count on you to finish something that i didn't get the time to finish.
[u]Requirement's[/u] -You must be reliable, when you say you're going to finish something, please do, i don't wan't to come home and find out i get to continue right where i left off. -Must be neat, i'm really OCD and whenever i run into messy code i have to fix it. -Heavy programming experience is not required but knowing what you're doing is. -Must be trusted, I've put a lot of time into my work and the last thing i want is everyone having access to it or my work being sold. -Must not rush, if you are familiar with 718's and/or matrix the developers rushed everything and because of that it's messy..very messy.
-I will have one test for you which will be to identify a piece of code & tell me what it does.
Slightly new to programming and need to get some more experience? i will be more than happy to work with you. Simply reply, or message me and i'll get back to you when i get time. :cool:

item.title: Could use a dev partner
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

I’m currently working on a 718, taking it slow and making sure things are done correctly,
due to taking things slow it’s hard to get things done on my own, most night’s i end up staying up till 6 am to finish something and then i go to sleep and go to work at 1 pm so it’s really getting in the way working alone.
You don’t have to be a master programmer, just someone who can program without needing a tutorial for everything, id like to count on you to finish something that i didn’t get the time to finish.

Requirement’s
-You must be reliable, when you say you’re going to finish something, please do, i don’t wan’t to come home and find out i get to continue right where i left off.
-Must be neat, i’m really OCD and whenever i run into messy code i have to fix it.
-Heavy programming experience is not required but knowing what you’re doing is.
-Must be trusted, I’ve put a lot of time into my work and the last thing i want is everyone having access to it or my work being sold.
-Must not rush, if you are familiar with 718’s and/or matrix the developers rushed everything and because of that it’s messy…very messy.

-I will have one test for you which will be to identify a piece of code & tell me what it does.

Slightly new to programming and need to get some more experience? i will be more than happy to work with you.
Simply reply, or message me and i’ll get back to you when i get time.

Read full topic
